tasks.label: backend:dev
args: Set-Location "D:\VS CODE PROJECTS\Bored_projects\SOS-APP\sos-backend"; if (Test-Path .\mvnw.cmd) { .\mvnw.cmd spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.jvmArguments="-Dspring.devtools.restart.trigger-file=.restart" } else { mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.jvmArguments="-Dspring.devtools.restart.trigger-file=.restart" }

tasks.label: backend:dev
args: cd /d "D:\VS CODE PROJECTS\Bored_projects\SOS-APP\sos-backend" && if exist mvnw.cmd ( mvnw.cmd spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.jvmArguments="-Dspring.devtools.restart.trigger-file=.restart" ) else ( mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.jvmArguments="-Dspring.devtools.restart.trigger-file=.restart" )

tasks.label: backend:dev-cmd
args: cd /d "D:\VS CODE PROJECTS\Bored_projects\SOS-APP\sos-backend" && if exist mvnw.cmd ( mvnw.cmd spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.jvmArguments="-Dspring.devtools.restart.trigger-file=.restart" ) else ( mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.jvmArguments="-Dspring.devtools.restart.trigger-file=.restart" )
